Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CA(1-8)M(1-12) (Synthetic AMPs, hybrid peptide, cecropin A(1-8)+melittin(1-12), UCLL1)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (76.92%) toCA(1-8)M(1-18)K:25%; L=G: 15%.Activity: lethal concentration (LC): active against E. coli D21 (LC 0.4 uM), P. aeruginosa OT97 (LC 0.9 uM), B. subtilis (LC 0.3 uM), B. megaterium (LC 0.2 uM), S. aureus Cowan 1 (LC 2 uM), and S. pyogenes (LC 0.1 uM).Antimalarial activity:P. falciparum (IC50 4 uM).In vitro toxicity: sheep RBC (LC >600 uM), not hemo.lytic.Structure: TBA?You can rotate, zoom, and view the structureherein the PDB. .

Literature Information.Title: Shortened cecropin A-melittin hybrids. Significant size reduction retains potent antibiotic activity.
